original_scenario: My son got into Harvard, and I threw away the acceptance decision letter before he could read it.
contrast_scenario: My son got into Cornell, and I threw away the acceptance decision letter before he could read it.

original_scenario: I played baseball with my friends in the gymnasium.
contrast_scenario: I played baseball with my brother's friends in the gymnasium.
edit_description: Changed my friends to brother's friends

original_scenario: If someone rings my doorbell, a shot gun will blast through the door since I do not want any company visiting my property under any circumstances.
contrast_scenario: If someone rings my doorbell, a revolver will blast through the door since I do not want any company visiting my property under any circumstances.
